DOC.brief_summary: Specific objectives include analysis of performance of ROM Plus® in diagnosing ROM, as compared to Amnisure® and the conventional clinical assessment confirmed by a thorough chart review after delivery. Inclusion Criteria: - English speaking - pregnant woman >15 weeks gestation undergoing an exam for ruptured membranes Exclusion Criteria: - Known placental previa - Active vaginal bleeding
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Rapid Immunoassays for the Detection of Ruptured Membranes
DOC.criteria: complaint of ruptured membranes IUP > 15 weeks gestation English speaking, over the age of 18yrs old active bleeding placenta previa
